credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Project for a ceiling fresco: Leda with the swan
provenance: From the collection of: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink, pencil on paper
description: Circular borderline.  Leda upon clouds, recumbent, the swan beside her.  Amor is aiming at her.
name: Drawing
